General.Name: Baltic Bridge S.A.
General.Description: Baltic Bridge Spólka Akcyjna engages in the investment, financing, and brokerage business. It is also involved in the private equity venture capital projects; and provision of capital for business ventures, financial advisory, and asset management services. The company was formerly known as Investments Spólka Akcyjna and changed its name to Baltic Bridge Spólka Akcyjna in December 2016. Baltic Bridge Spólka Akcyjna was founded in 1993 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. Baltic Bridge Spólka Akcyjna is a subsidiary of PJW Holdings Limited.
General.Address: ul. United Nations Roundabout 1, Warsaw, Poland, 00-124
